cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper proposes a summarization approach for scientific articles, which involves leveraging citation-context and the document discourse model. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the natural language processing (NLP) sub-category of computer science, which is cs.CL. Additionally, the use of citation-context and discourse structure also suggests that the paper may be relevant to information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and deep learning (cs.DL) sub-categories.
